about.title: About Us
about.intro: At Freedive Analyzer, we are passionate about freediving and technology. Our goal is to help freedivers analyze their performance and progress safely.
about.who_text: We are a multidisciplinary team of developers, freediving coaches and data experts, creating tools to improve your training.
about.mission_text: To make high-level performance analysis accessible to all freedivers, from beginners to pros.
about.offer_1: Session analysis for dynamic and static apnea
about.why_text: Because we love freediving as much as you do. Everything we build is focused on helping you improve and dive safer.
about.closing: Thank you for being part of the Freedive Analyzer community. We dive with you!

privacy.title: Política de Privacidad
privacy.intro: Esta aplicación respeta tu privacidad y cumple con el Reglamento General de Protección de Datos (RGPD/GDPR).
privacy.collect_desc: Solo recogemos la información mínima necesaria para identificarte y guardar tus datos personales en la aplicación. Esto puede incluir:
privacy.usage_desc: Tus datos se utilizan exclusivamente para ofrecerte la funcionalidad de la aplicación. No se comparten con terceros ni se usan con fines publicitarios.
privacy.storage_desc: Utilizamos Firebase como proveedor seguro para autenticación y almacenamiento de datos. Puedes consultar su política de privacidad en
privacy.rights_desc: De acuerdo con la legislación vigente, tienes derecho a acceder, modificar o eliminar tus datos personales. Puedes ejercer este derecho contactándonos.
privacy.contact_desc: Si tienes dudas o deseas ejercer tus derechos sobre la protección de datos, puedes escribirnos a:

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a question, suggestion, or need support? Fill out the form or write us directly.
contact.also_contact: You can also reach us at:

terms.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to Freedive Analyzer. By accessing or using this website (www.freediveanalyzer.com), you agree to be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use this site.
terms.general_text: This website is operated by Freedive Analyzer. We reserve the right to modify or update these terms at any time, so we recommend checking them regularly.
terms.service_text: Freedive Analyzer provides tools and resources for performance tracking in freediving. This website is for informational purposes only and does not replace professional or medical advice.
terms.usage_age: You must be at least 18 years old or have the consent of a legal guardian.
terms.usage_respect: You agree to use the site legally and respectfully.
terms.usage_account: If you register, you are responsible for maintaining your account securely.
terms.ip_text: All content on this site is owned by Freedive Analyzer or its licensors and is protected by Spanish and international intellectual property laws. Reproduction without permission is not allowed.
terms.liability_text: We do not guarantee the information is always accurate or up to date. Freedive Analyzer is not responsible for misuse of the data or resulting damages.
terms.privacy_text: Personal data is handled in accordance with GDPR. Please review our Privacy Policy for more information.
terms.links_text: Freedive Analyzer may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their content or policies.
terms.modifications_text: We reserve the right to modify or suspend the website or parts of it at any time without prior notice.
terms.law_text: These terms are governed by Spanish law. In case of dispute, the parties submit to the courts of {{city}}.
terms.contact_text: If you have any questions about these terms, contact us at:
